Message.Title: Just wanted to let you know...
Message.Msg: i've just tried listing an item and the damn site don't work.. I've been listing on ebay since apr 2000... I'm here to see why this is NOT a short POS. I called and warned them i would short the hell out of this stock if they don't change their ways.. and I got a laugh in the face reply.. that is just azzinine.. after the last 2 years of totally being hard to list on the site.. off-handed un-respectful replies to my concerns.. I shall totally take all my business to craigslist from now on.. as I hav eno time to call ebay #$%$ every single time I have a problem listing an itme on their site... maybe i just nedd to put together a sh!# load of internet peeps to put together another site which can do and will do much better toward the SELLER.. who is the back bone of all the business done on line.. who de el is in control of this entity which seems to not care about any problem the SELLER has. moneymax3001 on ebay since 2000 and search the whole internet for more items which you may be wanting.. maxwell
I'm selling my eBay stock on eBay... go fig... hehe moneymax3001 since 2000

Topic.Title: agqut, Gina, Shack, and countless others were......, ME!!!!!

Message.Msg: P.S.S. Your big announcement kinda fell flat. Or, should I say flaccid? What a let down that must be for you. Nobody cared. The only person left to tell was you and your long list of nasty characters. The only person you got a rise out of was me and that's only because I thought we were "friends". How many other people did you lead to believe that?
